response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product worth $8,000 to you at a slightly higher but still reasonable cost compared to the market. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 9500}
